Uses of Package
oracle.kv.lob

  • Packages that use oracle.kv.lob 
    Package Description
    oracle.kv
    This package contains the public API for using Oracle NoSQL Database.
    oracle.kv.lob
    The KVLargeObject interface defines the operations used to read and write Large Objects (LOBs) such as audio and video files.
  • Classes in oracle.kv.lob used by oracle.kv 
    Class and Description
    KVLargeObject
    The KVLargeObject interface defines the operations used to read and write Large Objects (LOBs) such as audio and video files.
  • Classes in oracle.kv.lob used by oracle.kv.lob 
    Class and Description
    InputStreamVersion
    Holds a Stream and Version that are associated with a LOB.
    KVLargeObject.LOBState
    The enumeration defines the states associated with a LOB.
    PartialLOBException
    Thrown when KVLargeObject.getLOB(oracle.kv.Key, oracle.kv.Consistency, long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit) is invoked on a partial LOB.
